tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Within 3 days I have recovered from infection...Good treatment received... 

Doctor don't prescribe a long list of medicine that is best part.. He helped me for getting the test done..since I was unable to find the lab which Where the prescribed test were happening . 

Before reaching to doctor The infection lasted for 2 months and after all treatments applied I  was unable to get cure... Thanks to him that after long-lasting disease his prescribed medicines helped me to recover quickly... 

I Highly recommend Doctor Sarthak ......
reply_text: Thank you so much for this detailed review. I am really grateful. Stay healthy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He was extremely patient with all my questions on my physical visit. Explained everything to me. Doesn’t prescribe unnecessary medications until absolutely necessary. The online follow ups were also very easy after I left the city and he’s quick and prompt with his responses online. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sarthak was of great help when he started my treatment . He patiently listened to all my issue and took all my medical history before recommending any medicine or treatment. He was very approachable and answered all my questions.I wish him all the best and would recommend him 100%
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. Wish you a speedy recovery.

review:
The Doctor is really kind and gives Right suggestion, The doctor suggested the right test for my fever and gave the consultation online. He responded to our messages and he made video call whenever we needed. He suggested the right medicine by which my fever went away. I’m having mild Typoid for which he has started the medicine which is going on now. 
Dr Sarthak is really patient and friendly by nature.
Will surely recommend him.
